author: sobryan
msg: Added some pom changes to handle liscencing in distributables and clean some things up.
These changes were made as a result of some comments on the Portlet Bridge 2.0.0-alpha
tag and were applied there first.
* Added a plugin which will add NOTICE and LISCENCE to the generated javadoc
* Changed the NOTICE.txt files in subprojects to NOTICE to comply with Apache standards
* Deleted the liscence so the Remote Resource Plugin can pull the latest liscense from Apache
* Deleted the portlet1.0 faces config extensions
* Modified the assembly project to include the correct NOTICE and LISCENSE

author: kristwaa
msg: DERBY-3907: Save useful length information for Clobs in store.
Fixed a bug where the stream could be out of sync with the descriptor.
